channel.title: mcrypt on Realjf's blog
channel.description: Recent content in mcrypt on Realjf's blog

item.title: windows环境下安装Php扩展Mcrypt
item.description: 准备 xampp环境 mcrypt扩展下载地址https://windows.php.net/downloads/pecl/releases/mcrypt/ 解压安装 解压后，直接复制php_mcrypt.dll到php/ext目录下， 然后在php.ini中添加一行extension=php_mcrypt.dll，重启apache即可
